subject: Renta Centre Website Changes
preview: Hi Madeleine, Thanks for getting back to us. Confirming the below updates have now been made.

full_threads.body:
Hi Madeleine, 

Thanks for getting back to us. Confirming the below updates have now been made.
@heath The changes below are done. I just need some clarifications with the fonts. Should we use the one on the live site or we will use the Open sans(Currently setup on staging).

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Please see website changes for Renta Centre below.

There seems to be some grammatical errors throughout the website - please ensure that all font is a consistent font colour and size as well.

Alignment Issue:
  • Seems to be a slight alignment issue on nearly all pages - see below examples.




Adding product to cart:

  • When a product is added to cart I think there needs to be confirmation like JB HIFI does - currently nothing happens and it's confusing whether or not something has been added.
  • When you click to view cart, currently this window appears (see below)- there's no way to navigate back to continue shopping. I think when you view cart there needs to be a summary of your cart with the option to 'continue shopping' - once you've clicked 'check-out' then it locks you in to fill out the details.
In the checkout process:
  • step 1, email address needs to be a compulsory field to proceed, currently not (despite red asterisk). Also can we add "* compulsory field" to any checkout page that has compulsory fields?

  • Step 2, 2nd field needs to be compulsory not first, the way it is at the moment. The line "Sorry, we are Sydney based………." Should only appear when someone enters a postcode that doesn't begin with a 2, not sit there statically, this will confuse customers
  • Step 3, remove the "(optional)" after how many months and form of ID, its not optional, is compulsory
  • "About" page
    • We know what aussies want - I noticed this is throughout the website. Hopefully changing once will fix it everywhere?
    • aussies needs to have a capital A
    • #2 "Or select items online here", hyperlink for "here" should be: https://rentacentre.com.au/select-rental-products/.
    • Next day* delivery and installation - add asterisk after day and anywhere else on the website this wording appears (next day delivery…….) needs the asterisk
    • "Keep me informed of special offers", if the fields are incomplete and you submit. the page jumps up to the top and you may not realise it wasn't submitted unless you scroll down to see the errors. Can the page stay on the input field position so people know there was an error

  • Student rentals page
  • Remove 8.30am-12.30pm Saturday
  • Package 1, change to from $27.90 per week. Package 2, change to from $35.10. Package 3, change to from $47.70 per week
  • Contact us page: Remove "Broadway shop is now permanently closed. For any inquiries call our office on 02 9310 1999"

Appliances page , main menu drop down has 10 sub appliance pages but only 6 once you click through to the page????

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan

Social and Digital Marketing Manager

Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design



Follow us on:



M 0420 301 408 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

www.advantagestyling.com.au





From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Friday, 30 October 2020 at 8:32 pm
To: David Di Veroli <david@rentacentre.com.au>
Cc: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>, Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: Re: Renta Centre Website Changes

Hi Everyone,

Just an end of week update for the new RentaCentre site, we have worked through the below updates and they are ready to review.

Thanks and let's check in early next week.

Speak soon,

Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

David Di Veroli

<image001.jpg>

From: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 28 October 2020 3:52 PM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: David Di Veroli <david@rentacentre.com.au>; Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: Renta Centre Website Changes


Hi Heath,

How are you?

Please see all our changes to the Renta Centre website. I feel that some of our changes weren't actually pulled across from the wireframe you had designed and worked on so there are quite a few changes I'm afraid.

Let me know if you need any clarification on the below, thanks.


Homepage- Header

  • Search bar is very long - maybe we can shorten the length
  • Hyperlink for 'Call button' phone number is incorrect
<image022.png>
  • Update image banner - will give you new creative - Whats the dimensions for this?
  • Main navigation bar menu points to incorrect subpage category groups- please make sure these point relevant pages as per existing website

<image023.png>

  • Add * after the word delivery

<image024.png>

  • Update copy to 'Exercise Bikers' to 'Exercise Bikes'

<image025.png>

  • Update all product buttons to appear as 'Add to cart' not APPLY NOW including the main top header button.

<image026.png>

  • Have one main centred button 'find out more' that links to the FAQ page. On the FAQ page can we have a CTA button - 'VIEW PRODUCTS' like this page https://rentacentre.com.au/select-rental-products/

<image027.png>

  • We need to capture first name and email to personalise mail outs- whats the best way to do this? When I submitted my email it also pulled me to the top of the homepage so I couldn't see the confirmation of submission. Maybe a pop-up box saying 'Thanks, we've subscribed you to our newsletter and special offers.'

<image028.png>

  • For the main navigation buttons that have been moved to the footer, can we also have a hamburger for these menus in the top navigation menu - left justified before the 'furniture'

<image029.png>

  • Place * before 'conditions apply' ALSO change to sentence case.

<image030.png>

ADD TO CART

  • When you click 'add to cart' button on any product on the website, rather than go to the separate cart page, can we just have a pop-up that says - added to cart + a button 'view cart'

SUBSCRIPTION POP UP

  • After a visitor is on the website after 1minute can we have a pop-up box with a CTA to 'receive offers'

Copy: Your one stop shop for all your home appliance and furniture rentals.

Hear about our latest deals and promotions.

---- Email address and firstname boxes

Subscription example

<image031.png>

  • Remove the 'ASK A QUESTION…' Form from all non product pages

<image032.png>

  • This cart pop out needs to be updated
  • Remove apply now above product image and before product description
  • Remove apply now , view cart button
  • Change blue button to read - CHECKOUT
  • Change font colour of product descriptions to black
  • The yellow 'need more help' button obscures the cart pop up - can this disapear or move out of the way.

<image033.png>

CHECKOUT

  • At the bottom in 'order summary' section add '$ / week' next to total and remove SUBTOTAL line, not needed.
  • Darken the outline or shadow on field boxes to make more obvious
  • Remove 'billing details' copy
  • Remove company name field
  • Privacy statement and tc's need to link to relevant pages
  • When you proceed to next step - the display position needs to start back at the top of the page

<image034.png>

  • Remove Billing details copy
  • Remove checkout heading and copy underneath
  • Address field- swap the order of the first two fields
  • Remove State field
  • If post code field doesn't start with a 2 - copy apears stating 'Sorry, we are Sydney based, you are outside of our delivery area'
  • Remove country field
  • move how many months into step three - FAST TRACK SECTION

<image035.png>

  • Remove checkout and billing headings and details copy
  • Remove Step 3 copy out of line box

<image036.png>

CATEGORY PAGE DUPLICATIONS

Furniture>Beds>Federation package duplicated

Furniture>Bedroom Furniture> Federation package duplicated

Appliances>Freezers>Small chest freezer duplicated

Appliances>Fridges>Small fridge duplicated

Appliances>Washing machines>Compact top load washing machine duplicated

Packages>Bedroom Packages> Federation package duplicated

Packages>House Furniture Rental Packages> Federation package duplicated

Incorrect H1's

These must match the old website exactly for SEO. I found a few but you will need to cross check all of them and ensure they are exact copy matches

For example: OLD VS NEW

<image037.png><image038.png>

Remarketing email

Please update to the below copy:

Hi David,

How's the changes coming along from yesterday? Would like to send to Heath today. Feel free to send back to me and I can sent to Heath.

What do you think of this copy below for the abandoned cart remarketing?

Hello,
Thanks for visiting Renta Centre. I've noticed that you haven't completed your order.
Here's a link to continue where you left off:
Continue Your Purchase Now
If you have any questions please feel free to give us a quick call 02 9310 1999.
Kindly,

David
RentaCentre

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan

Social and Digital Marketing Manager

Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design
